thread.title: EASTVALE: Water agency sets drought drop-in
thread.title_full: EASTVALE: Water agency sets drought drop-in - Press Enterprise

author: SANDRA STOKLEY
title: EASTVALE: Water agency sets drought drop-in
text:
By SANDRA STOKLEY / STAFF WRITER
Published: Oct. 13, 2015 8:42 a.m. EASTVALE: Water agency sets drought drop-in Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT The Jurupa Community Services District will host a “Drought Drop-in” on Wednesday, Oct. 14, at Eastvale City Hall. , SANDRA STOKLEY, STAFF Related article » The Jurupa Community Services District on Wednesday, Oct. 14 will host a “drought drop-in” at Eastvale city hall from 10 a.m to 2 p.m. to answer customer questions about water conservation, drought regulations and rebates to underwrite the cost of conservation projects.
District employees also will be distributing free conservation kits that include a hose nozzle, kitchen faucet aerator,a shower timer and leak detection tablets.
The Jurupa district is the water provider to Eastvale and much of Jurupa Valley.
Eastvale city hall is in the Eastvale Gateway shopping center, 12363 Limonite Ave., Suite 910.
Information: 951-727-3521.
Contact the writer: 951-368-9647 or sstokley@pe.com
